patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Closed Ready Stance B
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to B, forming a left walking stance toward B at the same time executing a low block to B with the left forearm.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Bring the left foot to the right foot, and then move the right foot to A to form a left L-stance toward A while executing a twin forearm block.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Execute a middle side piercing kick to D with the right foot.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Lower the right foot to D, and then move the left foot to F to form a left walking stance toward F while executing a rising block with the left forearm.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Bring the left foot to the right foot, and then move the right foot to E to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle strike to E with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Bring the right foot to the left foot, forming a closed ready stance B toward D.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Jump to D to form a left X-stance toward DG while executing a high side strike to D with the left back fist, bringing the right finger belly to the left side fist.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Move the right foot to G, forming a right walking stance toward G while executing a high punch to G with the right fist.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Move the right foot on line GH to form a left fixed stance toward H while executing a high guarding block to H with the forearm.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Move the right foot to H, forming a right walking stance toward H while executing a middle thrust to H with the right straight finger tip.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Bring the right foot to the left foot, and then move the left foot to G to form a left walking stance toward G while executing a high side strike to G with the left back fist.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Move the left foot on line GH to form a sitting stance toward C while executing a scooping block with the left palm.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Execute a middle turning kick to C with the left foot.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Lower the left foot to C in a jumping motion, forming a left X-stance toward CF while executing a high block to C with the left double forearm.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Move the right foot to F to form a sitting stance toward C while extending the right fist horizontally to C. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Execute a front strike to C with the left back fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward C.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Bring the right foot behind the left foot, and then move the left foot to E, forming a left diagonal stance toward C while executing a pressing block with a twin palm.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Execute a middle block to C with a double arc-hand while forming a left walking stance toward CE.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Pull the left reverse footsword to the right knee joint to form a right one-leg stance toward C at the same time executing a high side block to F with the right outer forearm and a low side block to E with the left forearm.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Lower the left foot to D forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a pressing block with the right palm. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Pull the left instep to the hollow of the right leg to form a right one-leg stance toward C while striking the left palm with the right back forearm.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Lower the left foot to C, turning clockwise to form a right fixed stance toward D while thrusting to C with the left side elbow.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Move the right foot to A, forming a left L-stance toward A while executing a high guarding block to A with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Bring the right foot to the left foot, and then move the left foot to B to form a right L-stance toward B while executing a middle punch to B with the right fist.
patternSteps.26: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
